thread.title: Rihanna as Marion Crane in 'Bates Motel' - First Look Video!
thread.title_full: Rihanna as Marion Crane in 'Bates Motel' - First Look Video!

author: Just Jared
title: Rihanna as Marion Crane in 'Bates Motel' - First Look Video!
text:
The first look at Rihanna as the classic character Marion Crane in the upcoming season of Bates Motel has been revealed in the season five trailer!
The 28-year-old entertainer is set to guest star in the final season of the A&E series and she gets one line in the new teaser. “Can I get a room?” she is seen asking Norman Bates, played by Freddie Highmore .
Bates Motel is a Psycho prequel series and Marion Crane is stabbed to death in the shower of her room by Norman, dressed like his mother Norma.

Bates Motel: Rihanna as Marion Crane – First Look
